description:
The Radius Shorts are a mid-weight stretch climbing shorts, with slim leg, for year round climbing.

The Radius Shorts are made from midweight stretch cotton canvas, with knee articulation and gusset at crotch to allow maximum movement. Featuring two open hand pockets, coin pocket, two rear patch pockets, and a reinforced back hem it's both practical and tough.

With slim leg and YKK® zip fly and jeans button fastening, the Radius Shorts looks good on and off the crag. Ideal for cragging or bouldering.
name: Rab Radius Shorts, 12" Inseam - Mens
